title: Keep Them Warm
description: Dress your pets in cozy sweaters or jackets to protect from the cold.

title: Protect Their Paws
description: Use pet-friendly paw balm or booties to prevent ice and salt irritation.

title: Hydration Matters
description: Cold weather can dehydrate pets; always provide fresh water.

title: Limit Outdoor Time
description: Shorten walks in extreme cold and supervise your pets outdoors.

title: Check for Hypothermia
description: Watch for shivering or lethargy and keep pets inside during extreme cold.
